Provides working with VK API.

Auth Examples:

As user:

var vk = newVk(88005553535, "accaount password")


var vk = newVk("myAccessToken")

As Group

var vk = newVk("groupAccessToken", 1919822)

Calling Any VK API Method:

via callVkMethod proc

vk.callVkMethod("messages.send",
                %*{"message": "hello!",
                   "random_id": 123,
                   "peer_id": 123
})

via ~ macro

vk~messages.send(message="hello!", random_id=123, peer_id=123)

Imports

../core/exceptions, ../core/enums, ../core/consts, ../private/tools

Types

VkEvent = object
  name*: string
  action*: proc (event: JsonNode): Future[void]

VkRef = ref object
  client: AsyncHttpClient
  case kind*: VkKind
  of VkUser:
      nil

  of VkGroup:
      group_id*: uint        ## Group ID. Uses only when auth as a vk group.
    
  api*: string               ## Api version
  access_token*: string
  events*: seq[VkEvent]

    inline, raises: [], tags: [].}

proc callVkMethod(vk: VkRef; method_name: string; params: JsonNode = %*{}): Future[
    JsonNode] {...}{.raises: [Exception, ValueError],
                tags: [ReadIOEffect, RootEffect, TimeEffect, WriteIOEffect].}
Calls any VK API method by its name.
